f057a879-02e7-4bc6-8523-b5d884fe47fc.title: LeBron "King James" James
f057a879-02e7-4bc6-8523-b5d884fe47fc.content: LeBron Raymone James Sr. (born December 30, 1984) is an American professional basketball player for the Los Angeles Lakers of the National Basketball Association (NBA). Nicknamed "King James", he is widely recognized as one of the greatest players in the history of the sport

e230bc0d-86b7-4cd7-8794-f8234675e7f2.title: Real Madrid going for the 15th Champions League Cup
e230bc0d-86b7-4cd7-8794-f8234675e7f2.content: If Real manage to beat Man City at Etihad Stadium they will be again the big favorite for winning the competition.
